tools.name: notion_search_pages
tools.description: Search for pages in a Notion workspace by title or content

tools.name: notion_create_page
tools.description: Create a new page in a Notion workspace under a specified parent page or database

parent_id.description: ID of the parent page or database

content.description: Markdown content for the page body

tools.name: notion_update_page
tools.description: Update properties or content of an existing Notion page

page_id.description: ID of the page to update

properties.description: Key-value pairs of properties to update

archived.description: Set to true to archive the page

tools.name: notion_query_database
tools.description: Query a Notion database with filters and sorts to retrieve matching entries

database_id.description: ID of the database to query

filter.description: Filter object following Notion filter syntax

tools.name: notion_get_page
tools.description: Retrieve a single Notion page by its ID, including all properties and content blocks

page_id.description: ID of the page to retrieve

include_content.description: Whether to include page content blocks

tools.name: notion_add_comment
tools.description: Add a comment to a Notion page or discussion thread

page_id.description: ID of the page to comment on

discussion_id.description: ID of an existing discussion thread (optional)

tools.name: notion_list_databases
tools.description: List all databases accessible in the Notion workspace
